name: Casa De Garcia - Connecticut Blend - Churchill
additionalNotes: Casa de Garcia cigars are crafted in the Dominican Republic with an aged blend of Honduran and Dominican long filler tobaccos, a smooth Connecticut binder and a light brown Connecticut shade wrapper. The result - consistent cigars that are smooth, mellow and flavorful from beginning to end, and some of the most economical smokes around. Casa de Garcia Connecticut cigars feature a blend of premium long filler tobaccos from the Dominican Republic and Honduras covered with a silky to the touch golden brown Connecticut wrapper. You will experience a very easygoing and relaxing smoke that is mellow in strength, with creamy flavors of caramel, cocoa, leather, and sweet tobacco.
